EmailTemplate.subject: Maximize Your Profitability with SunPower
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
It has been a while since you last contacted us and we’d like to find out if you are still interested in joining SunPower’s industry-leading dealer network. We are currently looking for new dealers in your area and would like to gather some more information about your company through an updated application.
With SunPower you can: • Grow your business with low up-front investment • Access the best solar technology in the world • Save on inventory costs with direct to site delivery • Offer a wide range of financing options for homeowners • Leverage the most advanced and proven marketing, training and support programs in the industry
If you are interested in learning more, please fill out an updated application and we’ll get back to you shortly.
To access your application, please go to: http://sunpower.force.com/partners/partnerapp_1?Lid={!Lead.Id}
We thank you for your time and interest.
SunPower Customer Care Team Email: customercare@sunpowercorp.com Phone: 1-800-SUNPOWER (1-800-786-7693) www.sunpowercorp.com
“Our affiliation with SunPower has helped grow our business quickly despite the economic downturn and become profitable in less than a year. We’ve even managed to open a second office." - Jack Scott, Owner, Arizona Solar
Update your application now at: http://sunpower.force.com/partners/partnerapp_1?Lid={!Lead.Id}
If you want to be removed from future mailings, please send an email to customercare@sunpowercorp.com with "Unsubscribe" in the subject line.
